Guilt clouds the minds of those who ignore your [Glimpse of Redemption](/Actions.aspx?ID=2810). Instead of making an enemy who refuses redemption [enfeebled 2](/Conditions.aspx?ID=71), you can make it stupefied 2 for the same duration.
